attributes.action: Hold A Referendum on the EU treaty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
around 70% of British Laws are made in Brussels by European poloticions who know nothing about British law and society.

We are getting very very little out of the treaty and are putting too much in!

Why can we not keep trade borders open and offer military support to European powers without being any obligation of a treaty?
